name: KoolSkaterz
description:
THIS GAME IS NOT FINISHED AND IS A WORK IN PROGRESS

Do you DARE become a Kool Skater? Meet Gerald, the typical boring dorky loser underdog character, and join him on his journey to become the ultimate Kool Skater. Grind and shread everything you can on the street, nail the halfpipe, evade the cops, annoy your neighbors, and make public property your bitch. It's punk, who gives a fuck about being nice to others. Can you beat the douchebag showoff KoolSkater master, Timmy Richard? or will you die trying?

PISSSHITTERS OFFICIAL WEBSITE
